column3: Your target is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research facility. You'll be recovering {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operatives carrying biological sample cases.

column2: Mission complete, Commander. Come on back.

column2: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't going to be happy, Commander. Come back and we'll go over what happened.
column3: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't going to be happy, Commander. Come back and we'll go over what happened.

column2: You're in the right area; hold position until the samples are aboard.

column2: The operatives are lost, Commander. For now, focus on getting the sample cases out of there.
column3: The operatives are lost, Commander. For now, focus on getting the sample cases out of there.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't kidding about that non-tampering clause. The contract includes twenty pages of protocol for handling the sample cases we'll be recovering.

column2: We need you to recover our operatives from inside a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research facility. They will be carrying highly sensitive scientific materials which must be returned to us. These materials are of a biological nature, and must not be tampered with. Opening or tampering with the materials will be considered a breach of contract.
column3: We need you to recover our operatives from inside a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research facility. They will be carrying highly sensitive scientific materials which must be returned to us. These materials are of a biological nature, and must not be tampered with. Opening or tampering with the materials will be considered a breach of contract.

column2: Brilliant Minds
column3: Brilliant Minds

column2: This is an in-and-out mission. Locate the scientist and retrieve her.
column3: This is an in-and-out mission. Locate the scientist and retrieve her.

column2: Get to the research facility and take control with one of your 'Mechs.
column3: Get to the research facility and take control with one of your 'Mechs.

column2: Once she's aboard, head to the marked evac zone, where Sumire will pick you up in the Leopard.
column3: Once she's aboard, head to the marked evac zone, where Sumire will pick you up in the Leopard.

column2: Best of luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Best of luck, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: Excellent work, commander. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} research can continue.
column3: Excellent work, commander. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} research can continue.

column2: I'm scrubbing the mission. There's nothing more you can do here.
column3: I'm scrubbing the mission. There's nothing more you can do here.

column2: You're in the area. Hold position and get the scientist safely into a 'Mech.
column3: You're in the area. Hold position and get the scientist safely into a 'Mech.

column2: Commander, we perform a substantial amount of scientific research here in {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have been sabotaging our research stations, stretching our defenses thin. We've just learned that their ultimate target is a key scientist in our weapons development program. They've launched an assault that we believe is intended to capture her. We need you to reach the facility where she's stationed and extract her to safety.
column3: Commander, we perform a substantial amount of scientific research here in {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have been sabotaging our research stations, stretching our defenses thin. We've just learned that their ultimate target is a key scientist in our weapons development program. They've launched an assault that we believe is intended to capture her. We need you to reach the facility where she's stationed and extract her to safety.

column2: Carrier
column3: Carrier

column2: You want to do what with my 'Mechs?
column3: You want to do what with my 'Mechs?

column2: Told you so.
column3: Told you so.

column2: Yang, they will be perfectly safe. We'll scrub the command software once they're onboard the Leopard, and the virus won't even get near the Argo or the 'Mech Bay.
column3: Yang, they will be perfectly safe. We'll scrub the command software once they're onboard the Leopard, and the virus won't even get near the Argo or the 'Mech Bay.

column2: Goddamn right we will.
column3: Goddamn right we will.

column2: Commander, you'll need to move within range of the facility to pick up the virus signal. Order a 'Mech into this region and it should download automatically.
column3: Commander, you'll need to move within range of the facility to pick up the virus signal. Order a 'Mech into this region and it should download automatically.

column2: Protect the infected unit until you reach the extraction LZ, where Sumire will pick you up. Good luck, Commander.
column3: Protect the infected unit until you reach the extraction LZ, where Sumire will pick you up. Good luck, Commander.

column2: We've transferred the corrupted command software to storage.
column3: We've transferred the corrupted command software to storage.

column2: Good! Now wipe that damn thing before it gets into the Leopard!
column3: Good! Now wipe that damn thing before it gets into the Leopard!

column2: I told you this was a bad idea. Before you bring that thing back onto the Argo I want you to torch its computers.
column3: I told you this was a bad idea. Before you bring that thing back onto the Argo I want you to torch its computers.

column2: All the data coming from your unit just went bonkers, Commander. I'm just seeing static from its feed up here.
column3: All the data coming from your unit just went bonkers, Commander. I'm just seeing static from its feed up here.

column2: You don't need instruments to follow a giant titanium BattleMech; just eyeball it, Meyer. Commander, protect that unit and get it out of there.
column3: You don't need instruments to follow a giant titanium BattleMech; just eyeball it, Meyer. Commander, protect that unit and get it out of there.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.

column2: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.
column3: That's it, mech recovering our Secondary Target is scraped. S&R will look for what's left. That objective is failed. Focus on the Primary.

column2: I can only imagine what Yang is going to say to the idea of infecting one of our 'Mechs with hostile code.
column3: I can only imagine what Yang is going to say to the idea of infecting one of our 'Mechs with hostile code.

column2: We've discovered a facility where {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} researchers have developed a new computer virus that targets the control mechanisms of our 'Mechs. We can't build an effective defense against this virus without a sample of its code to work with. We need you to get one of your 'Mechs within range of the research facility and download the virus into its systems. Then extract the infected carrier 'Mech so we can analyze the virus.
column3: We've discovered a facility where {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} researchers have developed a new computer virus that targets the control mechanisms of our 'Mechs. We can't build an effective defense against this virus without a sample of its code to work with. We need you to get one of your 'Mechs within range of the research facility and download the virus into its systems. Then extract the infected carrier 'Mech so we can analyze the virus.

column2: Corporate Secrets
column3: Corporate Secrets

column2: This is the region where the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility is located.
column3: This is the region where the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility is located.

column2: There it is. Move up and occupy the facility, Commander.
column3: There it is. Move up and occupy the facility, Commander.

column2: Once it's secure, get the rogue scientist into one of your 'Mechs, and head for the marked evac zone.
column3: Once it's secure, get the rogue scientist into one of your 'Mechs, and head for the marked evac zone.

column2: Sumire will be waiting for your signal to pick you up. Best of luck, Commander.
column3: Sumire will be waiting for your signal to pick you up. Best of luck, Commander.

column2: Excellent work, commander. The wayward {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} scientist is on her way home.
column3: Excellent work, commander. The wayward {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} scientist is on her way home.

column2: Disappointing, Commander. I'll let our employers know that they might want to go back to the negotiating table.
column3: Disappointing, Commander. I'll let our employers know that they might want to go back to the negotiating table.

column2: You're in the right area. Hold position and force the scientist to board one of the Mechs.
column3: You're in the right area. Hold position and force the scientist to board one of the Mechs.

column3: That's it, the Mech recovering our Secondary Target is scrapped. That objective is failed. Focus on getting the scientist to safety.

column2: I think I've lost track of how many layers of betrayal this represents. Is this a quadruple-cross? This must be some scientist.

column2: A scientist for a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} conglomerate has turned industrial spy for a rival corporation from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. She was privy to numerous industrial secrets that we would prefer not to fall into our competitor's hands. The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} leadership has offered to sell her back, but we intend to use the false hope of negotiations to buy you time to extract the scientist through more proactive means.
column3: A scientist for a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} conglomerate has turned industrial spy for a rival corporation from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. She was privy to numerous industrial secrets that we would prefer not to fall into our competitor's hands. The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} leadership has offered to sell her back, but we intend to use the false hope of negotiations to buy you time to extract the scientist through more proactive means.

column2: Intelligence Agent
column3: Intelligence Agent

column2: We're coming up on the target facility, Commander.
column3: We're coming up on the target facility, Commander.

column2: There it is. Move up, secure the location, and pick up the agent.
column3: There it is. Move up, secure the location, and pick up the agent.

column2: Get her to the evac zone, and get the hell out of there.
column3: Get her to the evac zone, and get the hell out of there.

column2: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: The agent is away. Good work, Commander. Let's go get paid.
column3: The agent is away. Good work, Commander. Let's go get paid.

column2: I'm pulling the plug, Commander. No way to salvage this mess.
column3: I'm pulling the plug, Commander. No way to salvage this mess.

column2: The agent is on her way out. Hold position until she's safely aboard, and then get out of there.
column3: The agent is on her way out. Hold position until she's safely aboard, and then get out of there.

column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.

column2: We've lost the data, Commander. We'll send in a recovery team later; for now, focus on getting that agent to safety.
column3: We've lost the data, Commander. We'll send in a recovery team later; for now, focus on getting that agent to safety.

column2: There shouldn't be any surprises here, Commander. The target is expecting a pickup so she'll be aboard in a matter of moments. The data might be tougher but it's your call if you want to go after it.
column3: There shouldn't be any surprises here, Commander. The target is expecting a pickup so she'll be aboard in a matter of moments. The data might be tougher but it's your call if you want to go after it.

column2: One of our covert operatives was captured by a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} patrol during a routine data drop, and is being held at a secure facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We need a rapid response team to raid the facility and get our operative out safely. We will pay a bonus if you're able to secure the data she was trying to deliver, as well. It's being held at a separate facility.
column3: One of our covert operatives was captured by a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} patrol during a routine data drop, and is being held at a secure facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. column2: The scion of a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} mercantile concern has been missing for months. We suspect a kidnapping by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}, but there's been no ransom demand. A local group of sympathizers on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} recently picked up a garbled message from the scion indicating that she's being held in a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility there. Our intel failed to trace her to {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, so any loyal mechs are several jumps away. We need your help to extract her.
column3: The scion of a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} mercantile concern has been missing for months. We suspect a kidnapping by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}, but there's been no ransom demand. Our intel failed to trace her to {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, so any loyal mechs are several jumps away. We need your help to extract her.

column2: One of our people has been staying in accommodations provided by our friends, the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities. She's ready to move on, though, and so we'd like you to go in and pick her up. Her current landlords probably won't let her just leave, however, so expect to settle some arguments. There might be shooting involved.
